World Cup (Soccer)
Officiating (Sports)
lead_paragraph: UEFA, the ruling body for soccer in Europe, said 40 games are under suspicion, many involving Eastern European teams associated with illegal betting.
snippet: UEFA, the ruling body for soccer in Europe, said 40 games are under suspicion, many involving Eastern European teams associated with illegal betting.
